ISSUE.TITLE: nDCG should consider number of subjects
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I think the current nDCG measure is a bit wrong in situations where the number of predicted subjects is different from the number of gold standard subjects (i.e. very often). This should be taken into account somehow - perhaps by specifying that we always use nDCG@K where K is e.g. 5.
